description: VA.gov vets-api - Large Rails application (7,470 files, 37K symbols)

tasks.prompt: Where is ApiProviderFactory defined? Return just the file path and line number.
Find all functions that call ApiProviderFactory. List each caller with its file path and function name.
Find all usages of BackendServiceException in the codebase. How many references are there?
Trace the dependency graph from SubmitForm526AllClaim. What classes does it depend on within 3 levels?
